message.body: Hey Damon!!!! It's Sofie! I haven't forgot that you are here in boston and every time I walk by the Gardner I think of you!! Just wanted to say hi!
Hey! I was just thinking about you earlier this week. Hope all is well. I'm so excited the snow is finally melting. We still need to get together sometime
Yes!!! Actually I was wondering if u work on Saturdays?
Not this Saturday, but I do occasionally.
Yeah. You got a rough welcome to this city. Other than the blanket of white doom how has your transition been?
I ask about saturday because every Saturday I teach at the smfa and when I walk home I think omg Damon might be there!!!!
Oh wet should definitely connect on a Saturday then. What's your class schedule?

I only teach Friday and Saturday and the occasional Wednesday. So I have a pretty lax schedule. Monday morning/afternoon I work at Massart. In that big ugly building right next to you! So that's a good time for me too!!
